description: Identify the radio station with the highest number of listeners.
What is the total number of listeners reached by BBC Radio 2 and BBC Radio 4 combined?
Determine the range of listeners reached across all radio stations.
Find any radio station that has an unusually low number of listeners compared to others.
How many radio stations have more than 5,000 listeners?
Order the radio stations from the most listeners to the least.
What percentage of radio stations have fewer than 3,000 listeners?
Identify if there is a correlation between the radio station and the number of listeners reached.
Count the number of radio stations with similar listener counts.
Retrieve the number of listeners for BBC 6 Music.
